description: The repeal of a 1906 law gives greater freedom to non-locals looking to buy property in Alderney.
title: Alderney property purchase law relaxed
title_page: Alderney property purchase law relaxed - BBC News
maintext: "If the law achieves anything it is to frustrate the ambitions of high-net-worth individuals who might lawfully want to settle here and it also causes inheritance problems for those of us who might want to pass our properties on to persons who are not subjects of Her Majesty [Queen Elizabeth II]."
